back_translation: Like Mike is a light and unoriginal film: just like the glorious Michael Jordan mentioned in the title, many can aspire but none can match.

text: the cast , collectively a successful example of the lovable-loser protagonist , shows deft comic timing .

text: a grittily beautiful film that looks , sounds , and feels more like an extended , open-ended poem than a traditionally structured story .

text: strangely comes off as a kingdom more mild than wild .

text: a few hours after you 've seen it , you forget you 've been to the movies .

text: yet it 's not quite the genre-busting film it 's been hyped to be because it plays everything too safe .

back_translation: However, it is not quite the film that revolutionizes the genre as announced, because it relies too much on safety.

text: the biggest problem with roger avary 's uproar against the mpaa is that , even in all its director 's cut glory , he 's made a film that 's barely shocking , barely interesting and most of all , barely anything .
translation: le plus grand problème avec le tollé de Roger Avary contre la MPAA est que, même dans toute la gloire de la version du réalisateur, il a réalisé un film qui est à peine choquant, à peine intéressant et surtout, à peine quoi que ce soit.
back_translation: The biggest problem with Roger Avary's outcry against the MPAA is that, even in all the glory of the director's cut, he made a film that is barely shocking, barely interesting, and above all, barely anything at all.

text: peralta captures , in luminous interviews and amazingly evocative film from three decades ago , the essence of the dogtown experience .
translation: Peralta capture, dans des interviews lumineuses et un film incroyablement évocateur datant de trois décennies, l'essence de l'expérience de Dogtown.

text: manages to accomplish what few sequels can -- it equals the original and in some ways even betters it .

text: it shows that some studios firmly believe that people have lost the ability to think and will forgive any shoddy product as long as there 's a little girl-on-girl action .

text: that such a horrible movie could have sprung from such a great one is one of the year 's worst cinematic tragedies .

text: australian filmmaker david flatman uses the huge-screen format to make an old-fashioned nature film that educates viewers with words and pictures while entertaining them .

text: `` mr. deeds '' is suitable summer entertainment that offers escapism without requiring a great deal of thought .

text: lame sweet home leaves no southern stereotype unturned .

text: rice is too pedestrian a filmmaker to bring any edge or personality to the rising place that would set it apart from other deep south stories .

back_translation: Rice is a filmmaker too bland to bring any originality or personality to the expanding location that would set it apart from other stories of the deep South.

text: it 's always disappointing when a documentary fails to live up to -- or offer any new insight into -- its chosen topic .

back_translation: It is always disappointing when a documentary fails to live up to its chosen subject or to offer new perspectives.

text: yet another iteration of what 's become one of the movies ' creepiest conventions , in which the developmentally disabled are portrayed with almost supernatural powers to humble , teach and ultimately redeem their mentally `` superior '' friends , family ...
translation: une autre itération de ce qui est devenu l'une des conventions les plus troublantes des films, dans laquelle les personnes handicapées intellectuellement sont dépeintes avec presque des pouvoirs surnaturels pour humilier, enseigner et finalement racheter leurs amis, leur famille...
back_translation: Another iteration of what has become one of the most troubling conventions in films, in which individuals with intellectual disabilities are portrayed with almost supernatural powers to humiliate, teach, and ultimately redeem their friends and family...

text: you may be galled that you 've wasted nearly two hours of your own precious life with this silly little puddle of a movie .

text: confessions may not be a straightforward bio , nor does it offer much in the way of barris ' motivations , but the film is an oddly fascinating depiction of an architect of pop culture .

text: the inherent limitations of using a video game as the source material movie are once again made all too clear in this schlocky horror\/action hybrid .

text: what lifts the film high above run-of-the-filth gangster flicks is its refusal to recognise any of the signposts , as if discovering a way through to the bitter end without a map .
translation: Ce qui élève le film bien au-dessus des films de gangsters ordinaires, c'est son refus de reconnaître l'un des signes annonciateurs, comme s'il découvrait un chemin vers la fin amère sans carte.

translation: Ce que nous avons, c'est un personnage confronté à la possibilité que sa vie soit sans signification, vide et dépourvue de substance, dans un film qui est définitivement sans signification, vide et dépourvu de substance.

text: it 's refreshing that someone understands the need for the bad boy ; diesel , with his brawny frame and cool , composed delivery , fits the bill perfectly .

text: for all of its insights into the dream world of teen life , and its electronic expression through cyber culture , the film gives no quarter to anyone seeking to pull a cohesive story out of its 2 1\/2 - hour running time .
translation: Pour toutes ses perspectives sur le monde des rêves de la vie adolescente, et son expression électronique à travers la cyberculture, le film ne laisse aucune chance à quiconque cherchant à tirer une histoire cohérente de ses 2 heures et demie de durée.
back_translation: For all its perspectives on the dream world of adolescent life, and its electronic expression through cyberculture, the film leaves no chance for anyone trying to extract a coherent story from its two and a half hours duration.

text: with flashbulb editing as cover for the absence of narrative continuity , undisputed is nearly incoherent , an excuse to get to the closing bout ... by which time it 's impossible to care who wins .
translation: Avec un montage à l'éclair comme couverture de l'absence de continuité narrative, "Undisputed" est presque incohérent, une excuse pour arriver au combat final... à un moment donné, il est impossible de se soucier de qui gagne.
back_translation: With a quick montage as a cover for the lack of narrative continuity, "Undisputed" is almost incoherent, an excuse to get to the final fight... at some point, it becomes impossible to care who wins.

text: if we 're to slap protagonist genevieve leplouff because she 's french , do we have that same option to slap her creators because they 're clueless and inept ?

text: i 've had more interesting -- and , dare i say , thematically complex -- bowel movements than this long-on-the-shelf , point-and-shoot exercise in gimmicky crime drama .
translation: J'ai eu des mouvements intestinaux plus intéressants -- et, oserais-je dire, thématiquement plus complexes -- que cet exercice de drame criminel à gimmicks qui traîne sur les étagères depuis trop longtemps.

text: writer\/director walter hill is in his hypermasculine element here , once again able to inject some real vitality and even art into a pulpy concept that , in many other hands would be completely forgettable .
translation: Le scénariste/réalisateur Walter Hill est ici dans son élément hypermasculin, capable une fois de plus d'insuffler une véritable vitalité et même un peu d'art dans un concept à la limite de la vulgarité qui, entre d'autres mains, serait complètement oublié.

text: as it stands , crocodile hunter has the hurried , badly cobbled look of the 1959 godzilla , which combined scenes of a japanese monster flick with canned shots of raymond burr commenting on the monster 's path of destruction .
translation: En l'état, Crocodile Hunter a l'apparence hâtive et mal agencée de Godzilla de 1959, qui combinait des scènes d'un film de monstres japonais avec des séquences préenregistrées de Raymond Burr commentant le parcours de destruction du monstre.
back_translation: In its current state, Crocodile Hunter has the hasty and poorly arranged appearance of Godzilla from 1959, which combined scenes from a Japanese monster movie with pre-recorded sequences of Raymond Burr commenting on the monster's path of destruction.

text: leigh succeeds in delivering a dramatic slap in the face that 's simultaneously painful and refreshing .

text: i liked the original short story but this movie , even at an hour and twenty-some minutes , it 's too long and it goes nowhere .

back_translation: I liked the original story, but this film, even with a runtime of an hour and twenty minutes, is too long and goes nowhere.

text: a comedy that is warm , inviting , and surprising .

text: hatfield and hicks make the oddest of couples , and in this sense the movie becomes a study of the gambles of the publishing world , offering a case study that exists apart from all the movie 's political ramifications .
translation: Hatfield et Hicks forment le couple le plus étrange, et en ce sens, le film devient une étude des risques du monde de l'édition, offrant une étude de cas qui existe indépendamment de toutes les implications politiques du film.
back_translation: Hatfield and Hicks form the strangest couple, and in this sense, the film becomes a study of the risks of the publishing world, providing a case study that exists independently of all the political implications of the film.

text: the movie is so contrived , nonsensical and formulaic that , come to think of it , the day-old shelf would be a more appropriate location to store it .

back_translation: The film is so artificial, nonsensical, and formulated that, on reflection, a shelf of expired products would be a more appropriate place to store it.

text: this sensitive , smart , savvy , compelling coming-of-age drama delves into the passive-aggressive psychology of co-dependence and the struggle for self-esteem .

text: enigma looks great , has solid acting and a neat premise .

text: eventually , they will have a showdown , but , by then , your senses are as mushy as peas and you do n't care who fires the winning shot .

back_translation: In the end, they will have a face-to-face, but until then, your senses are as soft as peas and you don't care who takes the winning shot.

text: as warm as it is wise , deftly setting off uproarious humor with an underlying seriousness that sneaks up on the viewer , providing an experience that is richer than anticipated .

text: godard 's ode to tackling life 's wonderment is a rambling and incoherent manifesto about the vagueness of topical excess ... in praise of love remains a ponderous and pretentious endeavor that 's unfocused and tediously exasperating .
translation: L'ode de Godard à la découverte de la merveille de la vie est un manifeste décousu et incohérent sur l'ambiguïté de l'excès actuel... En louant l'amour reste une entreprise pesante et prétentieuse, désordonnée et ennuyeusement exaspérante.
back_translation: Godard's ode to the discovery of the wonder of life is a disjointed and incoherent manifesto on the ambiguity of current excess... While praising love, it remains a cumbersome and pretentious undertaking, disorganized and frustratingly tedious.

text: this ready-made midnight movie probably wo n't stand the cold light of day , but under the right conditions , it 's goofy -lrb- if not entirely wholesome -rrb- fun .
translation: ce film de minuit tout préparé ne résistera probablement pas à la lumière du jour, mais dans les bonnes conditions, c'est un plaisir loufoque -rond si ce n'est pas entièrement sain -rrb-.

text: although sensitive to a fault , it 's often overwritten , with a surfeit of weighty revelations , flowery dialogue , and nostalgia for the past and roads not taken .
translation: bien qu'il soit sensible à l'excès, il est souvent alourdi par un trop-plein de révélations pesantes, de dialogues fleurissants et de nostalgie pour le passé et les chemins non empruntés.
back_translation: Although it is sensitive to excess, it is often weighed down by an overabundance of heavy revelations, flowery dialogues, and nostalgia for the past and untraveled paths.

text: wiseman is patient and uncompromising , letting his camera observe and record the lives of women torn apart by a legacy of abuse .

text: it 's a compelling and horrifying story , and the laramie project is worthwhile for reminding us that this sort of thing does , in fact , still happen in america .
translation: c'est une histoire captivante et horrifiante, et le projet Laramie vaut la peine de nous rappeler que ce genre de choses se produit, en effet, encore en Amérique.
back_translation: It's a captivating and horrifying story, and the Laramie Project is worth reminding us that this kind of thing does indeed still happen in America.

text: ub equally spoofs and celebrates the more outre aspects of ` black culture ' and the dorkier aspects of ` white culture , ' even as it points out how inseparable the two are .
translation: ub se moque tout autant qu'il célèbre les aspects les plus excentriques de la « culture noire » et les aspects plus ringards de la « culture blanche », tout en soulignant à quel point les deux sont inséparables.
back_translation: He mocks just as much as he celebrates the most eccentric aspects of "black culture" and the more outdated aspects of "white culture," while emphasizing how inseparable the two are.

text: full frontal , which opens today nationwide , could almost be classified as a movie-industry satire , but it lacks the generous inclusiveness that is the genre 's definitive , if disingenuous , feature .
translation: Full Frontal, qui ouvre aujourd'hui à l'échelle nationale, pourrait presque être classé comme une satire de l'industrie cinématographique, mais il manque de cette générosité d'inclusivité qui est la caractéristique définitive du genre, même si cela semble désinvolte.
back_translation: Full Frontal, which opens today nationwide, could almost be classified as a satire of the film industry, but it lacks the generosity of inclusivity that is the defining characteristic of the genre, even if it appears casual.

text: what saves it ... and makes it one of the better video-game-based flicks , is that the film acknowledges upfront that the plot makes no sense , such that the lack of linearity is the point of emotional and moral departure for protagonist alice .
translation: Ce qui le sauve ... et en fait l'un des meilleurs films basés sur des jeux vidéo, c'est que le film reconnaît dès le départ que l'intrigue n'a aucun sens, de sorte que le manque de linéarité est le point de départ émotionnel et moral pour la protagoniste Alice.
back_translation: What saves it ... and actually makes it one of the best movies based on video games, is that the film acknowledges right from the start that the plot makes no sense, so the lack of linearity serves as the emotional and moral starting point for the protagonist Alice.

translation: magnifiquement produit.

translation: un drame captivant sur l’âge adulte concernant le parcours ardu d'une jeune fille sensible à travers une série de foyers d'accueil et une lutte féroce pour se libérer de l'emprise de sa mère dangereuse et dominatrice.

translation: L'accomplissement de Lee s'étend à sa compréhension souple du rôle que Brown a joué dans la culture américaine en tant qu'athlète, vedette de cinéma et image de l'indomptabilité noire.

text: it 's definitely an improvement on the first blade , since it does n't take itself so deadly seriously .
translation: c'est certainement une amélioration par rapport à la première lame, car elle ne se prend pas si sérieusement.

text: yet this one makes up for in heart what it lacks in outright newness .
translation: pourtant celui-ci compense par son cœur ce qu'il manque en nouveauté absolue.

text: the most memorable moment was when green threw medical equipment at a window ; not because it was particularly funny , but because i had a serious urge to grab the old lady at the end of my aisle 's walker and toss it at the screen in frustration .
translation: Le moment le plus mémorable a été lorsque Green a lancé un équipement médical contre une fenêtre ; non pas parce que c'était particulièrement drôle, mais parce que j'avais une forte envie de prendre le déambulateur de la vieille dame au bout de mon allée et de le lancer contre l'écran par frustration.
back_translation: The most memorable moment was when Green threw a medical device against a window; not because it was particularly funny, but because I had a strong urge to take the old lady's walker at the end of my driveway and throw it against the screen out of frustration.

text: the premise of `` abandon '' holds promise , ... but its delivery is a complete mess .
translation: le postulat de ``abandon'' est prometteur, ... mais sa réalisation est un véritable désastre.
back_translation: The assumption of "abandon" is promising, ... but its realization is a true disaster.

text: shyamalan offers copious hints along the way -- myriad signs , if you will -- that beneath the familiar , funny surface is a far bigger , far more meaningful story than one in which little green men come to earth for harvesting purposes .
translation: Shyamalan offre une multitude d'indices en cours de route -- une myriade de signes, si vous voulez -- que sous la surface familière et drôle se cache une histoire beaucoup plus grande et beaucoup plus significative qu'une simple histoire dans laquelle de petits hommes verts viennent sur Terre à des fins de récolte.
back_translation: Shyamalan offers a multitude of clues along the way -- a myriad of signs, if you will -- that beneath the familiar and funny surface lies a much larger and more significant story than just a simple tale in which little green men come to Earth for harvesting purposes.

text: call me a cynic , but there 's something awfully deadly about any movie with a life-affirming message .
translation: Traitez-moi de cynique, mais il y a quelque chose de terriblement mortel dans tout film avec un message qui donne la vie.
back_translation: Call me cynical, but there is something terribly deadly in any film with a message that gives life.

text: we started to wonder if ... some unpaid intern had just typed ` chris rock , ' ` anthony hopkins ' and ` terrorists ' into some univac-like script machine .

back_translation: we started to wonder if ... an unpaid intern hadn't simply typed `chris rock`, `anthony hopkins`, and `terrorists` into some sort of script machine similar to a univac.

text: it 's hard to imagine that even very small children will be impressed by this tired retread .
translation: Il est difficile d'imaginer que même de très jeunes enfants seront impressionnés par ce recyclage éculé.

text: the art direction is often exquisite , and the anthropomorphic animal characters are beautifully realized through clever makeup design , leaving one to hope that the eventual dvd release will offer subtitles and the original italian-language soundtrack .

text: adolescents will be adequately served by the movie 's sophomoric blend of shenanigans and slapstick , although the more lascivious-minded might be disappointed in the relative modesty of a movie that sports a ` topless tutorial service . '
translation: Les adolescents seront adéquatement servis par le mélange puéril de frasques et de comédie burlesque du film, bien que les esprits plus lascifs pourraient être déçus par la relative modestie d'un film qui propose un « service de tutoriel topless ».
back_translation: Teenagers will be adequately served by the childish mix of pranks and slapstick comedy in the film, although more lascivious minds may be disappointed by the relative modesty of a film that offers a "topless tutorial service."

text: about the best thing you could say about narc is that it 's a rock-solid little genre picture .
translation: Le meilleur que l'on puisse dire sur Narc, c'est que c'est un petit film de genre solide comme un roc.
back_translation: The best thing that can be said about Narc is that it is a little genre film as solid as a rock.

text: an unbelievably stupid film , though occasionally fun enough to make you forget its absurdity .
translation: un film incroyablement stupide, bien qu'il soit parfois assez amusant pour vous faire oublier son absurdité.
back_translation: an incredibly stupid film, although it is sometimes amusing enough to make you forget its absurdity.

text: star\/producer salma hayek and director julie taymor have infused frida with a visual style unique and inherent to the titular character 's paintings and in the process created a masterful work of art of their own .
translation: La star/productrice Salma Hayek et la réalisatrice Julie Taymor ont insufflé à Frida un style visuel unique et inhérent aux peintures du personnage éponyme, créant ainsi une œuvre d'art magistrale à part entière.
back_translation: The star/producer Salma Hayek and the director Julie Taymor infused Frida with a unique visual style inherent to the paintings of the eponymous character, thus creating a masterpiece in its own right.

text: what -lrb- denis -rrb- accomplishes in his chilling , unnerving film is a double portrait of two young women whose lives were as claustrophic , suffocating and chilly as the attics to which they were inevitably consigned .
translation: Ce que -lrb- Denis -rrb- réalise dans son film glaçant et troublant est un double portrait de deux jeunes femmes dont les vies étaient aussi claustrophobes, étouffantes et froides que les greniers auxquels elles étaient inévitablement condamnées.
back_translation: What Denis achieves in her chilling and unsettling film is a double portrait of two young women whose lives were as claustrophobic, stifling, and cold as the attics to which they were inevitably condemned.

text: to build a feel-good fantasy around a vain dictator-madman is off-putting , to say the least , not to mention inappropriate and wildly undeserved .
translation: Construire une fantasy réconfortante autour d'un dictateur vaniteux et fou est, pour le moins, déconcertant, sans parler du fait que c'est inapproprié et largement indéservi.
back_translation: Building a comforting fantasy around a vain and mad dictator is, to say the least, disconcerting, not to mention that it is inappropriate and largely undeserved.

text: a generic bloodbath that often becomes laughably unbearable when it is n't merely offensive .
translation: un bain de sang générique qui devient souvent risiblement insupportable quand il n'est pas simplement offensant.
back_translation: a generic bloodbath that often becomes laughably unbearable when it's not simply offensive.

text: judith and zaza 's extended bedroom sequence ... is so intimate and sensual and funny and psychologically self-revealing that it makes most of what passes for sex in the movies look like cheap hysterics .
translation: La séquence de chambre prolongée de Judith et Zaza est si intime, sensuelle, drôle et psychologiquement révélatrice qu'elle rend la plupart des scènes de sexe au cinéma ridiculement hysteriques.
back_translation: The extended bedroom sequence between Judith and Zaza is so intimate, sensual, funny, and psychologically revealing that it makes most sex scenes in cinema ridiculously hysterical.

text: with an unusual protagonist -lrb- a kilt-wearing jackson -rrb- and subject matter , the improbable `` formula 51 '' is somewhat entertaining , but it could have been much stronger .
translation: avec un protagoniste inhabituel -lrb- un jackson en kilt -rrb- et un sujet, le peu probable `` formule 51 '' est quelque peu divertissant, mais cela aurait pu être beaucoup plus fort.
back_translation: With an unusual protagonist - a Jackson in a kilt - and a subject, the unlikely "Formula 51" is somewhat entertaining, but it could have been much stronger.

text: this is the kind of movie during which you want to bang your head on the seat in front of you , at its cluelessness , at its idiocy , at its utterly misplaced earnestness .
translation: c'est le genre de film pendant lequel vous avez envie de frapper votre tête contre le siège devant vous, face à son absurde, à son idiotie, à son sérieux totalement déplacé.
back_translation: It's the kind of movie during which you feel like banging your head against the seat in front of you, confronted with its absurdity, its idiocy, and its totally misplaced seriousness.

text: its appeal will probably limited to lds church members and undemanding armchair tourists .
translation: Son attrait sera probablement limité aux membres de l'Église SDJ et aux touristes de canapé peu exigeants.

text: the latest adam sandler assault and possibly the worst film of the year .

text: the determination of pinochet 's victims to seek justice , and their often heartbreaking testimony , spoken directly into director patricio guzman 's camera , pack a powerful emotional wallop .

back_translation: The determination of Pinochet's victims to seek justice, as well as their often heart-wrenching testimonies delivered directly in front of the camera of director Patricio Guzmán, have a powerful emotional impact.

text: a beautiful , timeless and universal tale of heated passions -- jealousy , betrayal , forgiveness and murder .

text: hill looks to be going through the motions , beginning with the pale script .

text: who needs mind-bending drugs when they can see this , the final part of the ` qatsi ' trilogy , directed by godfrey reggio , with music by philip glass ?

text: disjointed parody .

text: typical animé , with cheapo animation -lrb- like saturday morning tv in the '60s -rrb- , a complex sword-and-sorcery plot and characters who all have big round eyes and japanese names .
translation: typique des animés, avec une animation bon marché - (comme la télévision du samedi matin dans les années 60) - une intrigue complexe de l'épée et de la sorcellerie et des personnages qui ont tous de grands yeux ronds et des noms japonais.
back_translation: typical of anime, with cheap animation - (like Saturday morning television in the 60s) - a complex sword and sorcery plot and characters who all have big round eyes and Japanese names.

text: you ca n't believe anyone would really buy this stuff .

text: the plot is nothing but boilerplate clichés from start to finish , and the script assumes that not only would subtlety be lost on the target audience , but that it 's also too stupid to realize that they 've already seen this exact same movie a hundred times
translation: l'intrigue n'est rien d'autre que des clichés standard du début à la fin, et le scénario suppose non seulement que la subtilité échapperait au public cible, mais qu'il est également trop stupide pour réaliser qu'il a déjà vu ce même film exactement cent fois
back_translation: The plot is nothing more than standard clichés from start to finish, and the screenplay assumes not only that subtlety would escape the target audience, but that they are also too stupid to realize that they have seen this same film exactly a hundred times before.

text: twenty years later , e.t. is still a cinematic touchstone .
translation: Vingt ans plus tard, E.T. est toujours une référence cinématographique.

text: angela gheorghiu as famous prima donna floria tosca , roberto alagna as her lover mario cavaradossi , and ruggero as the villainous , lecherous police chief scarpia , all sing beautifully and act adequately .
translation: Angela Gheorghiu en tant que célèbre prima donna Floria Tosca, Roberto Alagna dans le rôle de son amant Mario Cavaradossi, et Ruggero dans le rôle du machiavélique et libidineux chef de police Scarpia, chantent tous magnifiquement et jouent de manière adéquate.
back_translation: Angela Gheorghiu as the famous prima donna Floria Tosca, Roberto Alagna in the role of her lover Mario Cavaradossi, and Ruggero as the machiavellian and lecherous police chief Scarpia all sing beautifully and act appropriately.

text: gondry 's direction is adequate ... but what gives human nature its unique feel is kaufman 's script .
translation: La direction de Gondry est adéquate ... mais ce qui donne à la nature humaine son aspect unique, c'est le scénario de Kaufman.

back_translation: Although this crude and vulgar film provides some laughs, its critiques of modern society are just things we have already seen.

translation: Avec un large casting représentant un large éventail, le film de Tavernier avance avec l'énergie rythmée de "Son partenaire de tous les jours", tout en conservant une légèreté tout en abordant des thèmes sérieux.

text: unpretentious , charming , quirky , original

text: it 's a thin notion , repetitively stretched out to feature length , awash in self-consciously flashy camera effects , droning house music and flat , flat dialogue .
translation: c'est une notion mince, étirée de manière répétitive pour atteindre la durée d'un long métrage, inondée d'effets de caméra délibérément tape-à-l'œil, de musique house monotonique et de dialogues plats, plats.

translation: Pour tout le trim douloureux, "Secretary" est une romance agréable qui maintient un ton étonnamment joyeux tout au long, malgré quelques plongeons sporadiques de l'auteur dans le freudisme pop.

text: director george hickenlooper has had some success with documentaries , but here his sense of story and his juvenile camera movements smack of a film school undergrad , and his maudlin ending might not have gotten him into film school in the first place .
translation: Le réalisateur George Hickenlooper a connu un certain succès avec ses documentaires, mais ici, son sens de l'histoire et ses mouvements de caméra juvéniles rappellent un étudiant de cinéma de premier cycle, et sa fin mielleuse n'aurait peut-être même pas suffi à le faire entrer dans une école de cinéma au départ.
back_translation: Director George Hickenlooper had some success with his documentaries, but here, his sense of story and youthful camera movements resemble those of an undergraduate film student, and his sugary ending might not have even been enough to get him into film school in the first place.

text: stephen earnhart 's documentary is a decomposition of healthy eccentric inspiration and ambition -- wearing a cloak of unsentimental , straightforward text -- when it 's really an exercise in gross romanticization of the delusional personality type .
translation: Le documentaire de Stephen Earnhart est une décomposition d'inspiration et d'ambition saine et excentrique - revêtu d'un manteau de texte non sentimental et direct - alors qu'il s'agit en réalité d'un exercice de grossière romantisation du type de personnalité délirant.
back_translation: Stephen Earnhart's documentary is a decomposition of healthy and eccentric inspiration and ambition - cloaked in a coat of non-sentimental and direct text - while it is actually an exercise in the coarse romanticization of the delusional personality type.

text: somehow ms. griffiths and mr. pryce bring off this wild welsh whimsy .

text: if the film 's vision of sport as a secular religion is a bit cloying , its through-line of family and community is heartening in the same way that each season marks a new start .
translation: Si la vision du sport comme une religion laïque du film est un peu sucrée, son fil conducteur de la famille et de la communauté est réconfortant de la même manière que chaque saison marque un nouveau départ.

text: while somewhat less than it might have been , the film is a good one , and you 've got to hand it to director george clooney for biting off such a big job the first time out .
translation: Bien que cela soit quelque peu moins que ce qu'il aurait pu être, le film est bon, et il faut le reconnaître au réalisateur George Clooney d'avoir pris une telle grande responsabilité dès sa première fois.

text: if anything , the film is doing something of a public service -- shedding light on a group of extremely talented musicians who might otherwise go unnoticed and underappreciated by music fans .
translation: Si quelque chose, le film rend un véritable service public en mettant en lumière un groupe de musiciens extrêmement talentueux qui pourraient sinon passer inaperçus et sous-estimés par les amateurs de musique.
back_translation: If anything, the film provides a true public service by shining a light on an extremely talented group of musicians who might otherwise go unnoticed and underestimated by music lovers.

back_translation: Claude Chabrol's camera has a way of gently swaying back and forth as it cradles its characters, veiling the tension beneath otherwise tender movements.

translation: Une grande partie des séquences altérées numériquement apparaît découpée, comme si elle avait été filmée directement à partir d'un moniteur de télévision, tandis que l'utilisation extensive de séquences de stock devient rapidement un cliché fatigant.
back_translation: A large portion of the digitally altered sequences appears cut up, as if it had been filmed directly off a television monitor, while the extensive use of stock footage quickly becomes a tired cliché.

text: the fluid motion is astounding on any number of levels -- including the physical demands made on büttner -- and it implies in its wake the intractable , irreversible flow of history .
translation: Le mouvement fluide estastonnant à plusieurs niveaux, y compris les exigences physiques imposées à Büttner, et il implique dans son sillage le flux inextricable et irréversible de l'histoire.

translation: Birot crée un drame avec un sens du lieu et de l'âge si bien défini -- comme dans, 15 ans -- que les tourments et l'angoisse deviennent presque aussi opératiques pour nous qu'ils le sont pour ses personnages.

text: it makes me feel weird \/ thinking about all the bad things in the world \/ like puppies with broken legs \/ and butterflies that die \/ and movies starring pop queens
translation: ça me rend weird \/ en pensant à toutes les mauvaises choses dans le monde \/ comme les chiots avec des pattes cassées \/ et les papillons qui meurent \/ et les films avec des pop queens

text: a brilliant , absurd collection of vignettes that , in their own idiosyncratic way , sum up the strange horror of life in the new millennium .

text: beautiful , cold , oddly colorful and just plain otherworldly , a freaky bit of art that 's there to scare while we delight in the images .
translation: beau, froid, étrangement coloré et tout simplement surnaturel, une œuvre d'art étrange qui est là pour effrayer tout en nous réjouissant des images.
back_translation: Beautiful, cold, strangely colorful, and simply supernatural, a strange piece of art that is here to frighten while delighting us with images.

text: this is n't a stand up and cheer flick ; it 's a sit down and ponder affair .
translation: ce n'est pas un film qui fait se lever et applaudir ; c'est une affaire qui pousse à s'asseoir et à réfléchir.
back_translation: It's not a film that makes you stand up and applaud; it's a matter that encourages you to sit down and think.

text: this story still seems timely and important .
translation: cette histoire semble toujours pertinente et importante.

text: a sloppy , amusing comedy that proceeds from a stunningly unoriginal premise .
translation: une comédie maladroite et amusante qui découle d'un prémisse incroyablement peu original.

text: jae-eun jeong 's take care of my cat brings a beguiling freshness to a coming-of-age story with such a buoyant , expressive flow of images that it emerges as another key contribution to the flowering of the south korean cinema .
translation: Le film "Prends soin de mon chat" de Jae-eun Jeong apporte une fraîcheur envoûtante à une histoire de passage à l'âge adulte, avec un flux d'images à la fois joyeux et expressif, et s'affirme comme une autre contribution clé à l'épanouissement du cinéma sud-coréen.
back_translation: The film "Take Care of My Cat" by Jae-eun Jeong brings an enchanting freshness to a coming-of-age story, with a flow of images that is both joyful and expressive, and stands out as another key contribution to the growth of South Korean cinema.

text: the film 's appeal has a lot to do with the casting of juliette binoche as sand , who brings to the role her pale , dark beauty and characteristic warmth .
translation: L'attrait du film est en grande partie dû au casting de Juliette Binoche dans le rôle de Sand, qui apporte à ce personnage sa beauté sombre et pâle ainsi que sa chaleur caractéristique.
back_translation: The film's appeal is largely due to the casting of Juliette Binoche as Sand, who brings to this character her dark and pale beauty as well as her characteristic warmth.

text: like the english patient and the unbearable lightness of being , the hours is one of those reputedly `` unfilmable '' novels that has bucked the odds to emerge as an exquisite motion picture in its own right .
translation: Comme Le Patient anglais et L'Insoutenable Légèreté de l'être, Les Heures est l'un de ces romans réputés « inadaptables » qui a défié les probabilités pour émerger comme un film exquis en tant que tel.
back_translation: Like The English Patient and The Unbearable Lightness of Being, The Hours is one of those novels deemed "unadaptable" that has defied the odds to emerge as an exquisite film as such.

text: the footage of the rappers at play and the prison interview with suge knight are just two of the elements that will grab you .
translation: Les images des rappeurs en train de jouer et l'interview en prison avec Suge Knight ne sont que deux des éléments qui vous accrocheront.
back_translation: The images of the rappers playing and the prison interview with Suge Knight are just two of the elements that will draw you in.

text: -lrb- f -rrb- rom the performances and the cinematography to the outstanding soundtrack and unconventional narrative , the film is blazingly alive and admirable on many levels .
translation: -des performances et de la cinématographie à la bande sonore exceptionnelle et à la narration peu conventionnelle, le film est d'une vivacité éclatante et admirable à de nombreux niveaux.
back_translation: - With exceptional performances and cinematography to an outstanding soundtrack and unconventional storytelling, the film is vibrantly brilliant and admirable on many levels.

text: it 's bedeviled by labored writing and slack direction .
translation: c'est tourmenté par une écriture laborieuse et une direction laxiste.

text: it is too bad that this likable movie is n't more accomplished .
translation: Il est dommage que ce film sympathique ne soit pas plus réussi.

text: quiet , adult and just about more stately than any contemporary movie this year ... a true study , a film with a questioning heart and mind that is n't afraid to admit it does n't have all the answers .
translation: tranquille, adulte et juste un peu plus majestueux que n'importe quel film contemporain cette année... une véritable étude, un film avec un cœur et un esprit questionneurs qui n'ont pas peur d'admettre qu'ils n'ont pas toutes les réponses.
back_translation: Calm, mature, and just a bit more majestic than any contemporary film this year... a true study, a film with a heart and an inquisitive spirit that isn't afraid to admit it doesn't have all the answers.

text: although god is great addresses interesting matters of identity and heritage , it 's hard to shake the feeling that it was intended to be a different kind of film .
translation: Bien que "God is Great" aborde des questions intéressantes d'identité et d'héritage, il est difficile de se défaire du sentiment qu'il était destiné à être un film d'un autre type.
back_translation: Although "God is Great" addresses interesting questions of identity and heritage, it is hard to shake the feeling that it was meant to be a film of a different kind.

text: you can not guess why the cast and crew did n't sign a pact to burn the negative and the script and pretend the whole thing never existed .
translation: vous ne pouvez pas deviner pourquoi la distribution et l'équipe n'ont pas signé un pacte pour brûler le négatif et le scénario et prétendre que tout cela n'a jamais existé.
back_translation: You cannot guess why the cast and crew did not sign a pact to burn the negative and the script and pretend that all of this never existed.

translation: une grande partie de tout ce qui concerne lily chou-chou est fascinante : une partie de sa mélancolie pourrait vous faire pleurer.

text: it 's a rollicking adventure for you and all your mateys , regardless of their ages .
translation: c'est une aventure palpitante pour vous et tous vos amis, quel que soit leur âge.
back_translation: It's an exciting adventure for you and all your friends, no matter their age.

text: an empty shell of an epic rather than the real deal .
translation: une coquille vide d'une épopée plutôt que la véritable affaire.
back_translation: an empty shell of an epic rather than the real deal.

text: -lrb- scherfig -rrb- has made a movie that will leave you wondering about the characters ' lives after the clever credits roll .
translation: -scherfig- a réalisé un film qui vous laissera vous interroger sur la vie des personnages après que les génériques ingénieux aient défilé.
back_translation: -scherfig- made a film that will leave you questioning the lives of the characters after the clever credits have rolled.

text: it may be a somewhat backhanded compliment to say that the film makes the viewer feel like the movie 's various victimized audience members after a while , but it also happens to be the movie 's most admirable quality
translation: Cela peut sembler un compliment un peu indirect de dire que le film fait ressentir au spectateur la douleur des différents membres du public victimes après un certain temps, mais c'est aussi la qualité la plus admirable du film.
back_translation: It might seem like a somewhat indirect compliment to say that the film makes the audience feel the pain of the different members of the public who are victims after a while, but it is also the most admirable quality of the film.

text: a delightful entree in the tradition of food movies .
translation: une délicieuse entrée dans la tradition des films culinaires.
back_translation: a delicious start in the tradition of culinary films.

text: -lrb- johnnie to and wai ka fai are -rrb- sure to find an enthusiastic audience among american action-adventure buffs , but the film 's interests may be too narrow to attract crossover viewers .
translation: Johnnie To et Wai Ka Fai sont sûrs de trouver un public enthousiaste parmi les amateurs d'action-aventure américains, mais les intérêts du film pourraient être trop étroits pour attirer des spectateurs d'autres genres.
back_translation: Johnnie To and Wai Ka Fai are sure to find an enthusiastic audience among American action-adventure fans, but the film's appeal may be too narrow to attract viewers from other genres.

text: conceptually brilliant ... plays like a living-room war of the worlds , gaining most of its unsettling force from the suggested and the unknown .
translation: conceptuellement brillant ... se déroule comme une guerre des mondes dans un salon, gagnant la plupart de sa force dérangeante grâce au suggéré et à l'inconnu.
back_translation: conceptually brilliant ... unfolds like a war of the worlds in a living room, gaining most of its disturbing strength through the suggested and the unknown.

text: this feature is about as necessary as a hole in the head
translation: cette fonctionnalité est aussi nécessaire qu'un trou dans la tête
back_translation: this feature is as necessary as a hole in the head

text: -lrb- danny huston gives -rrb- an astounding performance that deftly , gradually reveals a real human soul buried beneath a spellbinding serpent 's smirk .
translation: Danny Huston offre une performance époustouflante qui révèle habilement et progressivement une véritable âme humaine enfouie sous le sourire ensorcelant d'un serpent.
back_translation: Danny Huston delivers a stunning performance that skillfully and gradually reveals a true human soul buried beneath the serpent's enchanting smile.

text: in addition to hoffman 's powerful acting clinic , this is that rare drama that offers a thoughtful and rewarding glimpse into the sort of heartache everyone has felt , or will feel someday .
translation: En plus du puissant atelier d'acteur de Hoffman, c'est ce drame rare qui offre un aperçu réfléchi et gratifiant du genre de chagrin que tout le monde a ressenti, ou ressentira un jour.
back_translation: In addition to Hoffman’s powerful acting workshop, this rare drama provides a thoughtful and rewarding glimpse into the kind of grief that everyone has felt or will feel one day.

text: this is n't exactly profound cinema , but it 's good-natured and sometimes quite funny .
translation: ce n'est pas exactement du cinéma profond, mais c'est de bonne humeur et parfois assez drôle.
back_translation: It's not exactly deep cinema, but it's good-natured and sometimes quite funny.

text: hailed as a clever exercise in neo-hitchcockianism , this clever and very satisfying picture is more accurately chabrolian .
translation: saluée comme un exercice astucieux dans le néo-hitchcockisme, cette image intelligente et très satisfaisante est plus précisément chabrolienne.
back_translation: Hailed as a clever exercise in neo-Hitchcockism, this smart and very satisfying image is more precisely Chabrolian.

text: it leers , offering next to little insight into its intriguing subject .
translation: il regarde de manière oblique, offrant peu d'insights sur son sujet intrigant.
back_translation: he looks sideways, offering little insight into his intriguing subject.

text: a pleasant and engaging enough sit , but in trying to have the best of both worlds it ends up falling short as a whole .
translation: une assise agréable et suffisamment engageante, mais en essayant d'avoir le meilleur des deux mondes, elle finit par ne pas remplir son rôle dans son ensemble.
back_translation: a pleasant and sufficiently engaging seat, but by trying to have the best of both worlds, it ultimately fails to fulfill its role as a whole.

text: touches smartly and wistfully on a number of themes , not least the notion that the marginal members of society ... might benefit from a helping hand and a friendly kick in the pants .
translation: touche avec intelligence et mélancolie à un certain nombre de thèmes, notamment l'idée que les membres marginaux de la société ... pourraient bénéficier d'un coup de main et d'un coup de pied amical.
back_translation: touches with intelligence and melancholy on a number of themes, including the idea that the marginalized members of society ... could benefit from a helping hand and a friendly kick.

text: yakusho , as always , is wonderful as the long-faced sad sack ... and his chemistry with shimizu is very believable .
translation: Yakusho, comme toujours, est merveilleux en tant que triste visage allongé... et sa chimie avec Shimizu est très crédible.
back_translation: Yakusho, as always, is wonderful as the sad elongated face... and his chemistry with Shimizu is very believable.

text: works , it 's thanks to huston 's revelatory performance .
translation: Ça fonctionne, c'est grâce à la performance révélatrice de Huston.
back_translation: It works, it's thanks to Huston's revealing performance.

text: ararat feels like a book report
translation: Ararat ressemble à un rapport de lecture.
back_translation: Ararat resembles a reading report.

text: the beautiful images and solemn words can not disguise the slack complacency of -lrb- godard 's -rrb- vision , any more than the gorgeous piano and strings on the soundtrack can drown out the tinny self-righteousness of his voice .
translation: les belles images et les mots solennels ne peuvent pas masquer la complaisance lâche de la vision de -lrb- godard -rrb-, pas plus que le piano magnifique et les cordes de la bande sonore ne peuvent couvrir le ton désinvolte et self-righteous de sa voix.
back_translation: The beautiful images and solemn words cannot hide the lax complacency of -lrb- Godard -rrb-, just as the magnificent piano and strings of the soundtrack cannot cover the casual and self-righteous tone of his voice.

text: tully is in many ways the perfect festival film : a calm , self-assured portrait of small town regret , love , duty and friendship that appeals to the storytelling instincts of a slightly more literate filmgoing audience .
translation: Tully est à bien des égards le film de festival parfait : un portrait calme et sûr de lui des regrets, de l'amour, du devoir et de l'amitié dans une petite ville, qui séduit les instincts narratifs d'un public de cinéphiles légèrement plus lettrés.
back_translation: Tully is in many ways the perfect festival film: a calm and confident portrait of regrets, love, duty, and friendship in a small town, which appeals to the narrative instincts of a slightly more literate film-loving audience.

text: it 's a shame the marvelous first 101 minutes have to be combined with the misconceived final 5 .
translation: C'est dommage que les merveilleuses 101 premières minutes doivent être combinées avec les 5 dernières mal conçues.
back_translation: It's a shame that the wonderful first 101 minutes have to be combined with the poorly conceived last 5 minutes.

text: a surprisingly charming and even witty match for the best of hollywood 's comic-book adaptations .
translation: une adaptation étonnamment charmante et même pleine d'esprit qui rivalise avec le meilleur des adaptations de comics d'Hollywood.
back_translation: an surprisingly charming and even witty adaptation that rivals the best of Hollywood's comic book adaptations.

text: my advice is to skip the film and pick up the soundtrack .
translation: mon conseil est de passer le film et de prendre la bande originale.
back_translation: My advice is to watch the movie and take the soundtrack.

text: audacious-impossible yet compelling ...
translation: audacieux-impossible mais convaincant ...
back_translation: bold-impossible but convincing ...

text: a quasi-documentary by french filmmaker karim dridi that celebrates the hardy spirit of cuban music .
translation: un quasi-documentaire du cinéaste français Karim Dridi qui célèbre l'esprit résilient de la musique cubaine.
back_translation: A quasi-documentary by French filmmaker Karim Dridi that celebrates the resilient spirit of Cuban music.

text: family fare .
translation: nourriture familiale.
back_translation: family food.

text: the movie resolutely avoids all the comic possibilities of its situation , and becomes one more dumb high school comedy about sex gags and prom dates .
translation: le film évite résolument toutes les possibilités comiques de sa situation et devient une autre comédie lycéenne stupide sur les blagues sexuelles et les rendez-vous au bal.
back_translation: The film resolutely avoids all the comedic possibilities of its situation and becomes another stupid high school comedy about sexual jokes and prom dates.

text: one of recent memory 's most thoughtful films about art , ethics , and the cost of moral compromise .
translation: l'un des films les plus réfléchis de la mémoire récente sur l'art, l'éthique et le coût du compromis moral.
back_translation: one of the most thoughtful films in recent memory about art, ethics, and the cost of moral compromise.

text: even if you 're an agnostic carnivore , you can enjoy much of jonah simply , and gratefully , as laugh-out-loud lunacy with a pronounced monty pythonesque flavor .
translation: même si vous êtes un carnivore agnostique, vous pouvez profiter de beaucoup de jonah tout simplement, et avec gratitude, comme une folie à mourir de rire avec une saveur monty pythonesque prononcée.
back_translation: Even if you are an agnostic carnivore, you can simply enjoy a lot of Jonah, and with gratitude, as a laugh-out-loud madness with a pronounced Monty Python flavor.

text: one of the best of a growing strain of daring films ... that argue that any sexual relationship that does n't hurt anyone and works for its participants is a relationship that is worthy of our respect .
translation: l'un des meilleurs d'une tendance croissante de films audacieux ... qui soutiennent que toute relation sexuelle qui ne nuit à personne et fonctionne pour ses participants est une relation qui mérite notre respect.
back_translation: one of the best of a growing trend of bold films ... that argue that any sexual relationship that harms no one and works for its participants is a relationship that deserves our respect.

text: set in a 1986 harlem that does n't look much like anywhere in new york .
translation: situé dans un Harlem de 1986 qui ne ressemble pas à grand-chose à New York.
back_translation: set in a Harlem of 1986 that looks nothing like New York.

text: in the spirit of the season , i assign one bright shining star to roberto benigni 's pinocchio -- but i guarantee that no wise men will be following after it .
translation: Dans l'esprit de la saison, j'attribue une étoile brillante à "Pinocchio" de Roberto Benigni - mais je garantis qu'aucun sage ne la suivra.
back_translation: In the spirit of the season, I award a shining star to "Pinocchio" by Roberto Benigni - but I guarantee that no wise man will follow it.

text: evokes a palpable sense of disconnection , made all the more poignant by the incessant use of cell phones .
translation: évoque un sentiment palpable de déconnexion, rendu d'autant plus poignant par l'utilisation incessante des téléphones portables.
back_translation: evokes a palpable feeling of disconnection, made all the more poignant by the incessant use of mobile phones.

text: they crush each other under cars , throw each other out windows , electrocute and dismember their victims in full consciousness .
translation: Ils se broient sous les voitures, se jettent par les fenêtres, électrocutent et démembrent leurs victimes en pleine conscience.
back_translation: They get crushed under cars, throw themselves out of windows, electrocute and dismember their victims with full awareness.

text: in addition to scoring high for originality of plot -- putting together familiar themes of family , forgiveness and love in a new way -- lilo & stitch has a number of other assets to commend it to movie audiences both innocent and jaded .
translation: En plus d'obtenir de bons scores pour l'originalité de son intrigue - en réunissant des thèmes familiers de la famille, du pardon et de l'amour d'une manière nouvelle - Lilo & Stitch possède un certain nombre d'autres atouts qui le rendent recommandable aux spectateurs de cinéma, qu'ils soient innocents ou désabusés.
back_translation: In addition to achieving good scores for the originality of its plot - bringing together familiar themes of family, forgiveness, and love in a new way - Lilo & Stitch has a number of other strengths that make it recommendable to moviegoers, whether they are innocent or disillusioned.

text: perhaps it 's cliche to call the film ` refreshing , ' but it is .
translation: peut-être que c'est un cliché d'appeler le film « rafraîchissant », mais c'est le cas.
back_translation: Maybe it's a cliché to call the film "refreshing," but it is.

text: as predictable as the outcome of a globetrotters-generals game , juwanna mann is even more ludicrous than you 'd expect from the guy-in-a-dress genre , and a personal low for everyone involved .
translation: Aussi prévisible que le résultat d'un match entre globe-trotters et généraux, Juwanna Mann est encore plus loufoque que ce à quoi vous pourriez vous attendre du genre homme en robe, et un bas personnel pour tous les participants.
back_translation: As predictable as the outcome of a match between globe-trotters and generals, Juwanna Mann is even wackier than you might expect from the genre of man in a dress, and a personal bottom for all the participants.

text: almodovar is an imaginative teacher of emotional intelligence in this engaging film about two men who discover what william james once called ` the gift of tears . '
translation: Almodóvar est un enseignant imaginatif de l'intelligence émotionnelle dans ce film captivant sur deux hommes qui découvrent ce que William James a un jour appelé "le don des larmes".
back_translation: Almodóvar is an imaginative teacher of emotional intelligence in this captivating film about two men who discover what William James once called "the gift of tears."

text: a fantastically vital movie that manages to invest real humor , sensuality , and sympathy into a story about two adolescent boys .
translation: un film fantastiquement vital qui parvient à investir un véritable humour, sensualité et sympathie dans une histoire sur deux adolescents.
back_translation: a fantastically vital film that manages to invest real humor, sensuality, and sympathy into a story about two teenagers.

text: ... the story is far-flung , illogical , and plain stupid .
translation: ... l'histoire est lointaine, illogique et tout simplement stupide.
back_translation: ... the story is distant, illogical, and simply stupid.

text: and lee seems just as expectant of an adoring , wide-smiling reception .
translation: et Lee semble tout aussi impatient d'une réception adorante et souriante.
back_translation: and Lee seems just as eager for a loving and smiling reception.

text: it 's all arty and jazzy and people sit and stare and turn away from one another instead of talking and it 's all about the silences and if you 're into that , have at it .
translation: C'est tout artistique et jazzy et les gens s'assoient et regardent et se détournent les uns des autres au lieu de parler et tout est question de silences et si c'est ce qui vous intéresse, allez-y.
back_translation: It's all artistic and jazzy and people sit and watch and turn away from each other instead of talking and it's all about silences and if that's what interests you, go for it.

text: an old-fashioned drama of substance about a teacher 's slide down the slippery slope of dishonesty after an encounter with the rich and the powerful who have nothing but disdain for virtue .
translation: un drame suranné de substance concernant la chute d'un enseignant dans la pente glissante de la malhonnêteté après une rencontre avec les riches et les puissants qui n'ont rien d'autre que du mépris pour la vertu.
back_translation: An outdated drama of substance concerning the fall of a teacher into the slippery slope of dishonesty after an encounter with the rich and powerful, who have nothing but contempt for virtue.

text: another useless recycling of a brutal mid - '70s american sports movie .
translation: un autre recyclage inutile d'un brutal film de sport américain des années 70.
back_translation: another pointless recycling of a brutal American sports film from the 70s.

text: the kind of movie that leaves vague impressions and a nasty aftertaste but little clear memory of its operational mechanics .
translation: le genre de film qui laisse des impressions vagues et un arrière-goût désagréable mais peu de souvenirs clairs de son fonctionnement.
back_translation: the kind of film that leaves vague impressions and an unpleasant aftertaste but few clear memories of how it works.

text: hartley adds enough quirky and satirical touches in the screenplay to keep the film entertaining .
translation: Hartley ajoute suffisamment de touches originales et satiriques dans le scénario pour garder le film divertissant.
back_translation: Hartley adds enough original and satirical touches to the script to keep the film entertaining.

text: as literary desecrations go , this makes for perfectly acceptable , occasionally very enjoyable children 's entertainment .
translation: En matière de profanations littéraires, cela constitue un divertissement pour enfants parfaitement acceptable, parfois même très agréable.
back_translation: In terms of literary desecrations, this constitutes a perfectly acceptable entertainment for children, sometimes even quite enjoyable.

text: this insufferable movie is meant to make you think about existential suffering .
translation: ce film insupportable est censé vous faire réfléchir à la souffrance existentielle.
back_translation: this unbearable film is supposed to make you reflect on existential suffering.

text: goofy , nutty , consistently funny .
translation: débile, fou, constamment drôle.
back_translation: idiot, crazy, constantly funny.

text: two big things are missing -- anything approaching a visceral kick , and anything approaching even a vague reason to sit through it all .
translation: Deux grandes choses manquent : rien qui s'approche d'un coup viscéral, et rien qui s'apparente même à une vague raison de tout regarder.
back_translation: Two major things are missing: nothing that approaches a visceral blow, and nothing that even resembles a vague reason to watch everything.

text: if `` lilo & stitch '' is n't the most edgy piece of disney animation to hit the silver screen , then this first film to use a watercolor background since `` dumbo '' certainly ranks as the most original in years .
translation: Si "Lilo & Stitch" n'est pas le film d'animation Disney le plus audacieux à avoir atteint le grand écran, alors ce premier film à utiliser un fond aquarelle depuis "Dumbo" se classe certainement parmi les œuvres les plus originales depuis des années.
back_translation: If "Lilo & Stitch" is not the boldest Disney animated film to hit the big screen, then this first film to use a watercolor background since "Dumbo" certainly ranks among the most original works in years.

text: while it has definite weaknesses -- like a rather unbelievable love interest and a meandering ending -- this '60s caper film is a riveting , brisk delight .
translation: Bien qu'il ait des faiblesses certaines - comme un intérêt amoureux plutôt incroyable et une fin errante - ce film d'escroquerie des années 60 est un délice captivant et rapide.
back_translation: Although it has some clear weaknesses - such as a rather incredible love interest and a meandering ending - this 1960s heist film is a captivating and brisk delight.

text: it 's a talking head documentary , but a great one .
translation: c'est un documentaire avec des intervenants, mais un excellent.
back_translation: It's a documentary with speakers, but an excellent one.

text: an extremely unpleasant film .
translation: un film extrêmement désagréable.
back_translation: an extremely unpleasant film.

text: director juan jose campanella could have turned this into an argentine retread of `` iris '' or `` american beauty , '' but instead pulls a little from each film and creates something more beautiful than either of those films .
translation: Le réalisateur Juan José Campanella aurait pu transformer cela en une version argentine de « Iris » ou « American Beauty », mais il puise plutôt un peu dans chaque film et crée quelque chose de plus beau que l'un ou l'autre de ces films.
back_translation: Director Juan José Campanella could have turned this into an Argentine version of "Iris" or "American Beauty," but instead, he draws a little from each film and creates something more beautiful than either of those films.

text: not good enough to pass for a litmus test of the generation gap and not bad enough to repulse any generation of its fans .
translation: ni suffisamment bon pour servir de test décisif de l'écart générationnel, ni assez mauvais pour repousser une quelconque génération de ses fans.
back_translation: neither good enough to serve as a decisive test of the generational gap, nor bad enough to push any generation away from its fans.

text: after seeing the film , i can tell you that there 's no other reason why anyone should bother remembering it .
translation: Après avoir vu le film, je peux vous dire qu'il n'y a aucune autre raison pour laquelle quelqu'un devrait se donner la peine de s'en souvenir.
back_translation: After watching the movie, I can tell you that there is no other reason for someone to bother remembering it.

text: it stars schticky chris rock and stolid anthony hopkins , who seem barely in the same movie .
translation: Il met en vedette le schticky Chris Rock et l'impassible Anthony Hopkins, qui semblent à peine être dans le même film.
back_translation: It features the schticky Chris Rock and the stoic Anthony Hopkins, who barely seem to be in the same film.

text: merely -lrb- and literally -rrb- tosses around sex toys and offers half-hearted paeans to empowerment that are repeatedly undercut by the brutality of the jokes , most at women 's expense .
translation: seulement -lrb- et littéralement -rrb- jette des sex toys et offre des louanges à l'autonomisation qui sont à moitié sincères, souvent contredites par la brutalité des blagues, la plupart au détriment des femmes.
back_translation: only -lrb- and literally -rrb- throws sex toys and offers praise for empowerment that is half-hearted, often contradicted by the brutality of the jokes, most at the expense of women.

text: terrible .
translation: terrible.
back_translation: terrible.

text: throwing in everything except someone pulling the pin from a grenade with his teeth , windtalkers seems to have ransacked every old world war ii movie for overly familiar material .
translation: En intégrant tout, sauf quelqu'un tirant la goupille d'une grenade avec ses dents, Windtalkers semble avoir saccagé tous les anciens films de la Seconde Guerre mondiale pour en tirer du matériel trop familier.
back_translation: By integrating everything, except for someone pulling the pin from a grenade with their teeth, Windtalkers seems to have scavenged all the old World War II movies for overly familiar material.

text: chai 's structure and pacing are disconcertingly slack .
translation: La structure et le rythme de Chai sont déconcertamment lents.
back_translation: The structure and rhythm of Chai are disconcertingly slow.

text: if you grew up on scooby -- you 'll love this movie .
translation: Si vous avez grandi avec Scooby, vous adorerez ce film.
back_translation: If you grew up with Scooby, you will love this movie.

text: enjoyably fast-moving , hard-hitting documentary .
translation: un documentaire à la fois rapide et percutant.
back_translation: a fast and impactful documentary.

text: if you come from a family that eats , meddles , argues , laughs , kibbitzes and fights together , then go see this delightful comedy .
translation: Si vous venez d'une famille qui mange, intervient, se dispute, rit, discute et se bat ensemble, alors allez voir cette délicieuse comédie.
back_translation: If you come from a family that eats, intervenes, argues, laughs, discusses, and fights together, then go see this delightful comedy.

text: the director mostly plays it straight , turning leys ' fable into a listless climb down the social ladder .
translation: le directeur le joue principalement droit, transformant la fable de Leys en une descente sans vie dans l'échelle sociale.
back_translation: The director primarily plays it straight, transforming Leys' fable into a lifeless descent in the social ladder.

text: millions of dollars heaped upon a project of such vast proportions need to reap more rewards than spiffy bluescreen technique and stylish weaponry .
translation: Des millions de dollars consacrés à un projet d'une telle envergure doivent rapporter plus de récompenses qu'une technique de fond d'écran bleu élégante et des armes stylées.
back_translation: Millions of dollars dedicated to a project of such scale must yield more rewards than an elegant blue screen technique and stylish weapons.

text: any film that does n't even in passing mention political prisoners , poverty and the boat loads of people who try to escape the country is less a documentary and more propaganda by way of a valentine sealed with a kiss .
translation: Tout film qui ne mentionne même pas, ne serait-ce qu'en passant, les prisonniers politiques, la pauvreté et les bateaux chargés de personnes qui tentent de fuir le pays est moins un documentaire et plus de la propagande sous la forme d'une carte de Saint-Valentin scellée d'un baiser.
back_translation: Any film that doesn’t even mention, even in passing, political prisoners, poverty, and boats full of people trying to flee the country is less a documentary and more propaganda in the form of a Valentine’s Day card sealed with a kiss.

text: it 's depressing to see how far herzog has fallen .
translation: C'est déprimant de voir à quel point Herzog a chuté.
back_translation: It's depressing to see how much Herzog has fallen.

text: some episodes work , some do n't .
translation: certains épisodes fonctionnent, d'autres ne fonctionnent pas.
back_translation: Some episodes work, others do not.

text: like its new england characters , most of whom wander about in thick clouds of denial , the movie eventually gets around to its real emotional business , striking deep chords of sadness .
translation: Comme ses personnages de la Nouvelle-Angleterre, dont la plupart errent dans de épais nuages de déni, le film finit par aborder ses véritables enjeux émotionnels, touchant des accords profonds de tristesse.
back_translation: Like its characters from New England, most of whom wander in thick clouds of denial, the film eventually addresses its true emotional stakes, striking deep chords of sadness.

text: all the more disquieting for its relatively gore-free allusions to the serial murders , but it falls down in its attempts to humanize its subject .
translation: d'autant plus inquiétant en raison de ses allusions relativement exemptes de violence aux meurtres en série, mais il échoue dans ses tentatives d'humaniser son sujet.
back_translation: all the more worrying due to its relatively non-violent allusions to serial murders, but it fails in its attempts to humanize its subject.

text: a film of empty , fetishistic violence in which murder is casual and fun .
translation: un film de violence vide et fétichiste dans lequel le meurtre est banal et amusant.
back_translation: a work of empty and fetishistic violence in which murder is mundane and amusing.

text: for those in search of something different , wendigo is a genuinely bone-chilling tale .
translation: Pour ceux qui cherchent quelque chose de différent, Wendigo est un véritable récit qui donnera des frissons.
back_translation: For those looking for something different, Wendigo is a true tale that will give you chills.

text: disappointing in comparison to other recent war movies ... or any other john woo flick for that matter .
translation: décevant par rapport à d'autres récents films de guerre ... ou à n'importe quel autre film de John Woo en fait.
back_translation: disappointing compared to other recent war films ... or any other John Woo film for that matter.

text: it 's a familiar story , but one that is presented with great sympathy and intelligence .
translation: C'est une histoire familière, mais qui est présentée avec beaucoup de sympathie et d'intelligence.
back_translation: It's a familiar story, but presented with a lot of warmth and intelligence.

text: becomes a fascinating study of isolation and frustration that successfully recreates both the physical setting and emotional tensions of the papin sisters .
translation: devenant une étude fascinante de l'isolement et de la frustration qui recrée avec succès à la fois le cadre physique et les tensions émotionnelles des sœurs Papin.
back_translation: becoming a fascinating study of isolation and frustration that successfully recreates both the physical setting and the emotional tensions of the Papin sisters.

text: in questioning the election process , payami graphically illustrates the problems of fledgling democracies , but also the strength and sense of freedom the iranian people already possess , with or without access to the ballot box .

text: there 's a scientific law to be discerned here that producers would be well to heed : mediocre movies start to drag as soon as the action speeds up ; when the explosions start , they fall to pieces .
translation: il y a une loi scientifique à discerner ici que les producteurs feraient bien de prendre en compte : les films médiocres commencent à traîner dès que l'action s'accélère ; quand les explosions commencent, ils se désagrègent.
back_translation: There is a scientific law to discern here that producers would do well to take into account: mediocre films start to drag as soon as the action picks up; when the explosions begin, they fall apart.

text: clint eastwood 's blood work is a lot like a well-made pb & j sandwich : familiar , fairly uneventful and boasting no real surprises -- but still quite tasty and inviting all the same .

text: i found myself growing more and more frustrated and detached as vincent became more and more abhorrent .

text: for every articulate player , such as skateboarder tony hawk or bmx rider mat hoffman , are about a half dozen young turks angling to see how many times they can work the words `` radical '' or `` suck '' into a sentence .
translation: Pour chaque joueur articulé, comme le skateur Tony Hawk ou le pilote de BMX Mat Hoffman, il y a environ une demi-douzaine de jeunes qui essaient de voir combien de fois ils peuvent intégrer les mots "radical" ou "nul" dans une phrase.
back_translation: For every established player, like skateboarder Tony Hawk or BMX rider Mat Hoffman, there are about half a dozen young people trying to see how many times they can fit the words "radical" or "lame" into a sentence.

text: a culture clash comedy only half as clever as it thinks it is .

text: a 94-minute travesty of unparalleled proportions , writer-director parker seems to go out of his way to turn the legendary wit 's classic mistaken identity farce into brutally labored and unfunny hokum .

translation: Non, je ne sais pas pourquoi Steven Seagal est considéré comme une star, ni pourquoi il continue à être choisi pour des films d'action alors qu'aucun d'eux n'est jamais de bonne qualité ou ne rapporte d'argent.
back_translation: No, I don't know why Steven Seagal is considered a star, nor why he continues to be chosen for action movies even though none of them are ever of good quality or make any money.

text: if s&m seems like a strange route to true love , maybe it is , but it 's to this film 's -lrb- and its makers ' -rrb- credit that we believe that that 's exactly what these two people need to find each other -- and themselves .
translation: Si le BDSM semble être une route étrange vers le véritable amour, peut-être que c'est le cas, mais c'est à l'honneur de ce film - (et de ses créateurs) - que nous croyons que c'est exactement ce dont ces deux personnes ont besoin pour se trouver l'une l'autre - et elles-mêmes.
back_translation: If BDSM seems like a strange path to true love, perhaps it is, but it is to the credit of this film - (and its creators) - that we believe this is exactly what these two people need to find each other - and themselves.

text: little is done to support the premise other than fling gags at it to see which ones shtick .
translation: peu de choses sont faites pour soutenir le principe autre que de lui lancer des blagues pour voir lesquelles fonctionnent.
back_translation: Few things are done to support the principle other than throwing jokes at it to see which ones work.

text: one of those decades-spanning historical epics that strives to be intimate and socially encompassing but fails to do justice to either effort in three hours of screen time .
translation: l'un de ces épiques historiques s'étendant sur des décennies qui s'efforcent d'être intimes et socialement englobantes mais échouent à rendre justice à l'un ou l'autre effort en trois heures de temps d'écran.

text: a huge disappointment coming , as it does , from filmmakers and performers of this calibre

text: for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped .
translation: Pour un film qui est annoncé comme une comédie, Sweet Home Alabama n'est pas aussi drôle que vous l'espériez.

text: richard pryor mined his personal horrors and came up with a treasure chest of material , but lawrence gives us mostly fool 's gold .
translation: Richard Pryor a puisé dans ses horreurs personnelles et a trouvé un trésor de matériel, mais Lawrence nous donne principalement de l'or de fou.

text: a movie of riveting power and sadness .

text: robert john burke as the monster horns in and steals the show .
translation: Robert John Burke en tant que monstre attire l'attention et vole la vedette.

text: the new insomnia is a surprisingly faithful remake of its chilly predecessor , and when it does elect to head off in its own direction , it employs changes that fit it well rather than ones that were imposed for the sake of commercial sensibilities .
translation: le nouveau Insomnia est un remake étonnamment fidèle de son prédécesseur glacial, et quand il choisit de s'engager dans sa propre direction, il utilise des changements qui lui conviennent plutôt que ceux qui ont été imposés par souci de sensibilité commerciale.
back_translation: The new Insomnia is a surprisingly faithful remake of its icy predecessor, and when it chooses to forge its own path, it employs changes that suit it rather than those imposed for the sake of commercial sensibility.

text: just offbeat enough to keep you interested without coming close to bowling you over .
translation: juste assez décalé pour maintenir votre intérêt sans vous surprendre.

text: one can only assume that the jury who bestowed star hoffman 's brother gordy with the waldo salt screenwriting award at 2002 's sundance festival were honoring an attempt to do something different over actually pulling it off
translation: On ne peut que supposer que le jury qui a décerné à Gordy, le frère de Star Hoffman, le prix de scénarisation Waldo Salt lors du festival Sundance de 2002, honorait une tentative de faire quelque chose de différent plutôt que d'avoir réellement réussi à le faire.
back_translation: One can only assume that the jury which awarded Gordy, the brother of Star Hoffman, the Waldo Salt screenwriting award at the 2002 Sundance festival, was honoring an attempt to do something different rather than having actually succeeded in doing so.

text: seeks to transcend its genre with a curiously stylized , quasi-shakespearean portrait of pure misogynist evil .

text: not a stereotype is omitted nor a cliché left unsaid .

text: it 's coherent , well shot , and tartly acted , but it wears you down like a dinner guest showing off his doctorate .

text: k-19 will not go down in the annals of cinema as one of the great submarine stories , but it is an engaging and exciting narrative of man confronting the demons of his own fear and paranoia .
translation: K-19 ne figurera pas dans les annales du cinéma comme l'une des grandes histoires de sous-marins, mais c'est un récit captivant et palpitant d'un homme confrontant les démons de sa propre peur et de sa paranoïa.
back_translation: K-19 will not be remembered in the annals of cinema as one of the great submarine stories, but it is a captivating and thrilling tale of a man confronting the demons of his own fear and paranoia.

text: a four star performance from kevin kline who unfortunately works with a two star script .
translation: une performance de quatre étoiles de Kevin Kline qui, malheureusement, travaille avec un scénario de deux étoiles.
