text: god bless crudup and his aversion to taking the easy hollywood road and cashing in on his movie-star gorgeousness .

text: nicely combines the enigmatic features of ` memento ' with the hallucinatory drug culture of ` requiem for a dream . '

text: sorvino makes the princess seem smug and cartoonish , and the film only really comes alive when poor hermocrates and leontine pathetically compare notes about their budding amours .

text: -lrb- a -rrb- stale retread of the '53 original .
translation: -un recyclage éculé de l'original de 53.

text: more concerned with overall feelings , broader ideas , and open-ended questions than concrete story and definitive answers , soderbergh 's solaris is a gorgeous and deceptively minimalist cinematic tone poem .
translation: Plus préoccupé par les sentiments globaux, les idées plus larges et les questions ouvertes que par une histoire concrète et des réponses définitives, le Solaris de Soderbergh est un poème cinématographique magnifique et délibérément minimaliste.
back_translation: More concerned with global feelings, broader ideas, and open questions than with a concrete story and definitive answers, Soderbergh's Solaris is a magnificent and deliberately minimalist cinematic poem.

text: alarms for duvall 's throbbing sincerity and his elderly propensity for patting people while he talks .

text: there 's no point in extracting the bare bones of byatt 's plot for purposes of bland hollywood romance .

text: to better understand why this did n't connect with me would require another viewing , and i wo n't be sitting through this one again ... that in itself is commentary enough .

text: is a question for philosophers , not filmmakers ; all the filmmakers need to do is engage an audience .

text: at some point , all this visual trickery stops being clever and devolves into flashy , vaguely silly overkill .

text: michael moore has perfected the art of highly entertaining , self-aggrandizing , politically motivated documentary-making , and he 's got as potent a topic as ever here .

text: frei assembles a fascinating profile of a deeply humanistic artist who , in spite of all that he 's witnessed , remains surprisingly idealistic , and retains an extraordinary faith in the ability of images to communicate the truth of the world around him .

text: what 's surprising about this traditional thriller , moderately successful but not completely satisfying , is exactly how genteel and unsurprising the execution turns out to be .

text: watching this film , one is left with the inescapable conclusion that hitchens ' obsession with kissinger is , at bottom , a sophisticated flower child 's desire to purge the world of the tooth and claw of human power .

back_translation: E.T. works thanks to its stunning characters, 14-year-old Robert MacNaughton, 6-year-old Drew Barrymore, and 10-year-old Henry Thomas, who convince us of the existence of the wise aged visitor from a distant planet.

text: whether or not you buy mr. broomfield 's findings , the film acquires an undeniable entertainment value as the slight , pale mr. broomfield continues to force himself on people and into situations that would make lesser men run for cover .

back_translation: ... the good and different idea - (of romance in middle age) - is not well treated and, apart from the excellent performances of the stars, there is little else to recommend "never again."

text: would that greengrass had gone a tad less for grit and a lot more for intelligibility .

text: sadly , as blood work proves , that was a long , long time ago .

text: wise and deadpan humorous .

text: twenty-three movies into a mostly magnificent directorial career , clint eastwood 's efficiently minimalist style finally has failed him .
translation: Après vingt-trois films dans une carrière de réalisateur majoritairement magnifique, le style minimaliste et efficace de Clint Eastwood lui a finalement fait défaut.

text: boring and meandering .
translation: ennuyeux et sinueux.

text: an energizing , intoxicating documentary charting the rise of hip-hop culture in general and the art of scratching -lrb- or turntablism -rrb- in particular .

text: screenwriter dan schneider and director shawn levy substitute volume and primary colors for humor and bite .
translation: Le scénariste Dan Schneider et le réalisateur Shawn Levy remplacent le volume et les couleurs primaires par de l'humour et du mordant.

text: -lrb- ramsay -rrb- visually transforms the dreary expanse of dead-end distaste the characters inhabit into a poem of art , music and metaphor .

text: works as pretty contagious fun .

text: in the pianist , polanski is saying what he has long wanted to say , confronting the roots of his own preoccupations and obsessions , and he allows nothing to get in the way .

back_translation: In "The Pianist," Polanski says what he has long wanted to say, confronting the roots of his own concerns and obsessions, and he lets nothing get in his way.

text: ... liotta is put in an impossible spot because his character 's deceptions ultimately undo him and the believability of the entire scenario .

text: if there was ever a movie where the upbeat ending feels like a copout , this is the one .

back_translation: ... the casting represents their animated counterparts well ... but honestly, Scooby and Shaggy don't eat enough during the film.

text: those who do n't entirely ` get ' godard 's distinctive discourse will still come away with a sense of his reserved but existential poignancy .

text: ... there is enough originality in ` life ' to distance it from the pack of paint-by-number romantic comedies that so often end up on cinema screens .

text: raimi crafted a complicated hero who is a welcome relief from the usual two-dimensional offerings .

text: if you saw benigni 's pinocchio at a public park , you 'd grab your kids and run and then probably call the police .
translation: Si vous voyiez le Pinocchio de Benigni dans un parc public, vous attraperiez vos enfants et fuiriez, puis vous appelleriez probablement la police.
back_translation: If you saw Benigni's Pinocchio in a public park, you would grab your children and run away, then you would probably call the police.

text: it is dark , brooding and slow , and takes its central idea way too seriously .

text: it cuts to the core of what it actually means to face your fears , to be a girl in a world of boys , to be a boy truly in love with a girl , and to ride the big metaphorical wave that is life -- wherever it takes you .
translation: Cela touche au cœur de ce que signifie vraiment affronter ses peurs, être une fille dans un monde de garçons, être un garçon vraiment amoureux d'une fille et surfer sur la grande vague métaphorique qu'est la vie - peu importe où elle vous mène.
back_translation: This touches on the heart of what it really means to face your fears, to be a girl in a world of boys, to be a boy truly in love with a girl, and to ride the great metaphorical wave that is life - no matter where it leads you.

text: an enjoyable , if occasionally flawed , experiment .

text: it is , however , a completely honest , open-hearted film that should appeal to anyone willing to succumb to it .

text: i do n't think this movie loves women at all .

text: american musical comedy as we know it would n't exist without the precedent of yiddish theater , whose jolly , fun-for-fun 's - sake communal spirit goes to the essence of broadway .
translation: La comédie musicale américaine telle que nous la connaissons n'existerait pas sans le précédent du théâtre yiddish, dont l'esprit joyeux et festif, désintéressé, va à l'essence de Broadway.
back_translation: The American musical as we know it would not exist without the precedent of Yiddish theater, whose joyful and festive spirit, selfless, goes to the essence of Broadway.

translation: ne jugez pas celui-ci trop tôt - c'est une histoire sombre et rugueuse, mais elle prend des directions totalement inattendues et continue d'évoluer.

text: features nonsensical and laughable plotting , wooden performances , ineptly directed action sequences and some of the worst dialogue in recent memory .

translation: trop intelligent pour être ignoré mais un peu trop suffisant pour être aimé, cela pourrait être un film qui finit par frapper son public cible au visage en se tirant dans le pied.
back_translation: Too smart to be ignored but a little too arrogant to be loved, it could be a film that ultimately hits its target audience in the face while shooting itself in the foot.

text: the director 's many dodges and turns add up to little more than a screenful of gamesmanship that 's low on both suspense and payoff .
translation: Les nombreux détours et esquives du réalisateur ne se résument qu'à un écran rempli de manipulations qui manquent à la fois de suspense et de retour sur investissement.
back_translation: The numerous twists and evasions of the director amount to nothing more than a screen filled with manipulations that lack both suspense and a return on investment.

text: an invaluable historical document thanks to the filmmaker 's extraordinary access to massoud , whose charm , cultivation and devotion to his people are readily apparent .

back_translation: An invaluable historical document thanks to the filmmaker's extraordinary access to Massoud, whose charm, culture, and dedication to his people are clearly evident.

text: thanks largely to williams , all the interesting developments are processed in 60 minutes -- the rest is just an overexposed waste of film .

text: what might have emerged as hilarious lunacy in the hands of woody allen or mel brooks -lrb- at least during their '70s heyday -rrb- comes across as lame and sophomoric in this debut indie feature .
translation: ce qui aurait pu ressortir comme une folie hilarante entre les mains de woody allen ou mel brooks -lrb- du moins durant leur apogée des années 70 -rrb- apparaît comme faible et puéril dans ce premier long métrage indépendant.
back_translation: What could have emerged as hilarious madness in the hands of Woody Allen or Mel Brooks - at least during their peak in the 1970s - seems weak and childish in this first independent feature.

text: one well-timed explosion in a movie can be a knockout , but a hundred of them can be numbing .

text: pan nalin 's exposition is beautiful and mysterious , and the interviews that follow , with the practitioners of this ancient indian practice , are as subtle and as enigmatic .

back_translation: Pan Nalin's exhibition is beautiful and mysterious, and the interviews that follow, with practitioners of this ancient Indian practice, are just as subtle and enigmatic.

text: given the fact that virtually no one is bound to show up at theatres for it , the project should have been made for the tube .
translation: Étant donné que pratiquement personne n'est tenu de se rendre dans les cinémas pour cela, le projet aurait dû être conçu pour la télévision.

text: with more character development this might have been an eerie thriller ; with better payoffs , it could have been a thinking man 's monster movie .

back_translation: With more character development, it could have been a disturbing thriller; with better revelations, it could have been a monster movie for thoughtful minds.

text: queen of the damned as you might have guessed , makes sorry use of aaliyah in her one and only starring role -- she does little here but point at things that explode into flame .

text: australian actor\/director john polson and award-winning english cinematographer giles nuttgens make a terrific effort at disguising the obvious with energy and innovation .

back_translation: Australian actor/director John Polson and award-winning British cinematographer Giles Nuttgens make a tremendous effort to conceal the obvious with energy and innovation.

text: twohy knows how to inflate the mundane into the scarifying , and gets full mileage out of the rolling of a stray barrel or the unexpected blast of a phonograph record .
translation: Twohy sait comment transformer le banal en quelque chose de terrifiant, et il tire pleinement parti du déplacement d'un baril égaré ou de l'explosion inattendue d'un disque de phonographe.
back_translation: Twohy knows how to turn the mundane into something terrifying, and he fully takes advantage of the movement of a misplaced barrel or the unexpected explosion of a phonograph record.

text: at once a testament to the divine calling of education and a demonstration of the painstaking process of imparting knowledge .

text: insufferably naive .

translation: Le plaisir du film réside dans la possibilité d'observer Jackson, qui a également été producteur exécutif, déployer son numéro fluide, astucieux et puissant à l'étranger.

text: far too clever by half , howard 's film is really a series of strung-together moments , with all the spaces in between filled with fantasies , daydreams , memories and one fantastic visual trope after another .
translation: bien trop malin de moitié, le film de Howard est vraiment une série de moments enchaînés, avec tous les espaces entre remplis de fantasmes, de rêveries, de souvenirs et un incroyable trope visuel après l'autre.
back_translation: Too clever by half, Howard's film is really a series of connected moments, with all the spaces filled with fantasies, daydreams, memories, and an incredible visual trope after another.

text: serious and thoughtful .

translation: ... en aucun cas original, ni même vraiment mémorable, mais en tant que bonbon cérébral pour un samedi après-midi au centre-ville, cela ne déçoit pas.
back_translation: ... in no way original, nor really memorable, but as a brain candy for a Saturday afternoon downtown, it doesn't disappoint.

text: the 50-something lovebirds are too immature and unappealing to care about .
translation: Les amoureux de la cinquantaine sont trop immatures et peu attrayants pour susciter de l'intérêt.
back_translation: People in their fifties are too immature and unattractive to generate interest.

text: after a while , the only way for a reasonably intelligent person to get through the country bears is to ponder how a whole segment of pop-music history has been allowed to get wet , fuzzy and sticky .
translation: Après un certain temps, la seule façon pour une personne raisonnablement intelligente de traverser les Country Bears est de se demander comment un tout segment de l'histoire de la musique pop a pu devenir humide, flou et collant.
back_translation: After a certain amount of time, the only way for a reasonably intelligent person to get through the Country Bears is to wonder how an entire segment of the history of pop music could become wet, blurry, and sticky.

text: a lot of fun , with an undeniable energy sparked by two actresses in their 50s working at the peak of their powers .
translation: beaucoup de plaisir, avec une énergie indéniable suscitée par deux actrices dans la cinquantaine travaillant à leur apogée.

text: a breathtaking adventure for all ages , spirit tells its poignant and uplifting story in a stunning fusion of music and images .

back_translation: a breathtaking adventure for all ages, Spirit tells its poignant and inspiring story in a stunning fusion of music and imagery.

text: this is a nicely handled affair , a film about human darkness but etched with a light -lrb- yet unsentimental -rrb- touch .

back_translation: It is a well-managed affair, a film about human darkness but etched with a light touch - r-des - yet without sentimentality.

text: it 's ... worth the extra effort to see an artist , still committed to growth in his ninth decade , change while remaining true to his principles with a film whose very subject is , quite pointedly , about the peril of such efforts .
translation: c'est ... cela vaut l'effort supplémentaire de voir un artiste, encore engagé dans sa croissance à son neuvième décennie, changer tout en restant fidèle à ses principes avec un film dont le sujet est, de manière assez précise, le danger de tels efforts.
back_translation: It is ... it is worth the extra effort to see an artist, still engaged in their growth in their ninth decade, change while remaining true to their principles with a film whose subject is, quite precisely, the danger of such efforts.

text: in auteil 's less dramatic but equally incisive performance , he 's a charismatic charmer likely to seduce and conquer .

text: how many more times will indie filmmakers subject us to boring , self-important stories of how horrible we are to ourselves and each other ?

text: the plot of the comeback curlers is n't very interesting actually , but what i like about men with brooms and what is kind of special is how the film knows what 's unique and quirky about canadians .
translation: L'intrigue de "The Comeback Curlers" n'est pas très intéressante en fait, mais ce que j'aime dans "Men with Brooms", et ce qui est un peu spécial, c'est la façon dont le film sait ce qui est unique et original chez les Canadiens.

text: if you 're the kind of parent who enjoys intentionally introducing your kids to films which will cause loads of irreparable damage that years and years of costly analysis could never fix , i have just one word for you - -- decasia
translation: si vous êtes le genre de parent qui aime introduire intentionnellement vos enfants à des films qui causeront des dommages irréparables que des années et des années d'analyses coûteuses ne pourraient jamais réparer, j'ai juste un mot pour vous - -- decasia
back_translation: If you are the kind of parent who likes to intentionally introduce your children to films that will cause irreparable damage that years and years of costly analysis could never fix, I have just one word for you - decasia

text: all movie long , city by the sea swings from one approach to the other , but in the end , it stays in formula -- which is a waste of de niro , mcdormand and the other good actors in the cast .
translation: Tout au long du film, "City by the Sea" passe d'une approche à l'autre, mais à la fin, il reste sur une formule - ce qui est un gâchis pour De Niro, McDormand et les autres bons acteurs du casting.
back_translation: Throughout the film, "City by the Sea" shifts from one approach to another, but in the end, it sticks to a formula - which is a waste for De Niro, McDormand, and the other good actors in the cast.
